name: Crit Fail
description:
After staying up too late one night playing TTRPGs, Rosalyn has awoken to find that she must roll to succeed at absolutely everything. And on top of that, she's late for work at the bank!

(And also she's a robot; just pretend not to notice the default Unreal Engine model.)

Every time you input movement via [WASD], the game will roll to determine your degree of    success. 

Jumping with [SPACE] will also require a roll to see just how well you leap.

Thankfully, looking around with the mouse is free.

Bright red objects  indicate you must roll to succeed. You might have to interact with [E] or you might roll automatically.

To critically fail at any time, perhaps to try to jimmy your way out of getting stuck in a wall (what, no, that will never happen), press [F] to immediately roll a natural 1.

You win if you get to work at the bank before time runs out. If not, well, you're fired. But you can always try again.

This is my first game that has even approached being considered "complete", so thank you so much for playing!
